ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wish list, ctd..
ygData.msgSnippet: It is worth a white dragon scale, or SS BP, as it is most likely the 3rd best rogue weapon in the game behind Mrylokar s Dagger and a Primal Spear.  You should
ygData.messageBody:
It is worth a white dragon scale, or SS BP, as it is most likely the 3rd
best rogue weapon in the game behind Mrylokar's Dagger and a Primal
Spear. You should get a lute of the howler and a selo's drum imo, and
you would still be getting ripped off. a lute of the howler sold for
14k last night on mith marr, and selo's drums are about the same. and
its the only one i have ever seen sold. too bad i have no bard lol.
that horn you have is worth at least 75k.

oh and btw, it was a loot table screw-up again by verant. 16/22 wu's
fists of mastery were dropping in lesser fay, cobalt BPs were dropping
in sol a.

Shada/Erisi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 6:11 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Wish list, ctd..


Well, I spoke with my contact in the guild last night, and he seemed
amenable to the trade, however, he had no idea what the Lute was or
where
it dropped. Judging by the rarity, I think it's safe to assume they
don't
have one in the bank, so it may be some time...
This guy's a personal friend, so I know he'll do what's best for me
and
the Guild at the same time.

I'll keep you updated!

Talies the Wanderer
